name: Gangshan Wu
content: MCG@NJU Multimedia Computing Group, Nanjing University Nanjing University Â· Computer Science & Technology [ä¸­æ] Home Member Research Publication Resource Activity Alumni Gangshan Wu Professor Address: Room 1015, CS Building, Xianlin, Nanjing University Telephone: +86-25-89680998 Fax: +86-25-89680998 Email: gswu[at]nju.edu.cn Brief Gangshan Wu is a professor of Department of Computer Science and Technology of Nanjing University, and he is the head of Multimedia Lab of Nanjing University. He has visited Department of Computer Science of National Chiao Tung University. He has been the principal investigators and main investigators of dozens of key projects about computer vision, multimedia retrieval, intelligent web information processing, digital museum and large-scale seismic data processing and so on. He has published over 80 research papers on international and domestic journals and conferences. He has won the second prize of Science and Technological Achievement Awards of Jiangsu Province (1999), the grand prize of Education Achievement Award (2007), and the second prize of National High Education Achievement Award (2009). Currently, his research interests mainly include multimedia content analysis and retrieval. Selected Publication Yang Yang, Linjun Yang, Gangshan Wu, and Shipeng Li. A bag-of-objects retrieval model for web image search. ACM international conference on Multimedia (MM'12), 2012, 49-58. Danny Z. Chen, Xuehou Tan, Haitao Wang, and Gangshan Wu. Optimal point movement for covering circular regions. Algorithmica, 2015, 72(2):379-399. Yang Yang, Linjun Yang, Gangshan Wu, and Shipeng Li. Image relevance prediction using query-context bag-of-object retrieval model. IEEE Transactions on Multimedia, 2014, 16(6):1700-1712. Xuehou Tan and Gangshan Wu. Approximation algorithms for cutting a convex polyhedron out of a sphere. Theoretical Computer Science, 2013, 508:66-73. Xiangyang Xu, Ling Ge, Tongwei Ren and Gangshan Wu.
